```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv(
  "merged_df.csv",
  col_types = list(
    uniqueid = col_factor()
  ))
glimpse(df)
```
```{r}
filtered_df <- df %>% filter(!slider_copout, !(condition_0 %in% c("practice", "filler")))
```


```{r}
model <- lmer(slider_value ~ agent_is_subject + (1|item_id) + (agent_is_subject|uniqueid),
              data=filtered_df)
summary(model)
```
```{r}
ranef(model)
```
